Text: In part 2, they get free food, housing, medical treatment and money. In Part 3, they start a gang and begin dealing drugs, gangraping iraqi women and establish "territory". Part 4, they demand religious houses from which they preach violence and terror, blowing up innocent people, while claiming being people of "peace". Oh wait, that's the other way around!

To mister15. You want "these people" to go home then you're beating the wrong drum. Get the INVADERS OUT of their country and they wouldnt have a reason to leave. 
NINETY PERCENT of all kills in the war in IRAQ and surrounding areas are INNOCENT CIVILIANS. I know I would do what they are doing to ensure that my children LIVE.
Watch this show so you may have a hint of understanding and empathy. Sure, there are bad apples amongst them but show me a culture/country that doesnt. Humanity is/needs compassion.
Thanks for the up, much appreciated.
